Pre-Game Insights: The San Francisco Giants and the Milwaukee Brewers meet Wednesday in MLB action from American Family Field.
This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
The Giants are going with Kyle Harrison as the starting pitcher. This year in 22 starts Harrison is 7-5 with a 4.00 ERA.
Milwaukee is going with Freddy Peralta as the starting pitcher. This season Peralta is 8-7 with a 3.86 ERA in 26 starts.
Eleven of the Giants' last 12 games as underdogs against NL Central opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Four of the Brewers' last five games as home favorites have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Giants' last six night games against NL Central opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Brewers' last four games as favorites against National League opponents.
